Package r2b.apps.base

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BaseDialog.BaseDialogListener
    The activity that creates an instance of this dialog fragment must implement this interface in order to receive event callbacks.
    ClickableFragment
    Add support to fragments to receive from activity click events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseAbsListFragment<T>
    Wrapper for AbsList main functionality.
    BaseActivity
    Wrapper for activity main functionality.
    BaseAdapter<T>
    Wrapper for base adapter main functionality.
    BaseApplication
    Used as singleton class to initialize managers and utilities.
    BaseDialog
    A fragment that handles a dialog that can show a title, up to three buttons, a traditional single choice list, a list of selectable items (single with radio or multiple choice with checkbox), or a custom layout.
    BaseFragment
    wrapper for the main functionality of the fragment.
